subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Cubs are hoping that the expensive free-agent signings of left fielder Alfonso Soriano, left-hander Ted Lilly and third baseman Aramis Ramírez will help them end a championship drought that dates to 1908.
snippet: The Cubs are hoping that the expensive free-agent signings of left fielder Alfonso Soriano, left-hander Ted Lilly and third baseman Aramis Ramírez will help them end a championship drought that dates to 1908.
